## Bug Fixes

-   Class skill books now check if the user is the correct class.
-   *Elixir of Lesser Intelligence*, *Elixir of Intelligence*, *Elixir
    of Greater Intelligence*, *Elixir of Superior Intelligence*, and
    *Draught of Hera* can no longer be used by familiars (backpacks) of
    Warrior class heroes.

## Items

-   *Ring of Health*, *Life Gem*, *Charm of Speed*, *Athenian Cloak*,
    *Berzerker Helm*, *Cataphract*, *Shifting Cloak*. *Maul of
    Destruction*, *Scroll of Greater Regneration*, and *Scroll of
    Superior Regeneration* have been removed.
